document_data.name: Payit
document_data.mainbody: The '''Payits''', or the '''Payitlan''' people, were one of the seven major ethnicities of humans in [[Maztica]].<ref>
document_data.Description: Payits tended to be short but muscular. They were often described as having intense black eyes. They typically were industrious and practical, but proud of their cultural heritage. They were also slow to anger and quick to laugh, and had quick, open minds.
document_data.Geography: The Payit people lived in the Maztican nation of [[Payit]] and the jungles of [[Far Payit]]. Those in Far Payit were called [[Itza]]s.

Society.Language: The Payits spoke their own language.<ref>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|26}}

document_data.History: Millenia before the rise of [[Nexal]], the Payits had one of the greatest civilizations in Maztica. However, after the murder of a prince and princess, it mysteriously began to decline.
